articles.title: Mercury flyby tonight: Europe's BepiColombo spacecraft to attempt its 1st swing past the planet - Space.com
articles.description: It will be the closest look at Mercury for BepiColombo of its entire mission.
articles.content:
A spacecraft bound for the planet Mercury will take a first look at the target tonight, when it makes its first-ever flyby of the small rocky world during an incredibly close flyby tonight.

articles.title: The BepiColombo spacecraft is on its way to Mercury! - CBBC Newsround
articles.description: Europe's first mission to Mercury will arrive at its destination later today, but it won't be a very long visit.
articles.content:
Europe's first mission to Mercury, which is the smallest and least explored planet in our solar system, will arrive at its destination later today, but it won't be a very long visit!
